articles.content: With the NFL Draft on the horizon, the San Francisco 49ers are focused on adding as much good young talent as they can later this week. However, as NFL reporters and pundits have zeroed in on the top… [+7622 chars]

articles.title: Talladega winners and losers - NASCAR on NBC Sports
articles.description: Ross Chastain left Talladega Superspeedway as the big winner, but others like Austin Dillon and Michael McDowell still had plenty to smile about.
